item.title: DTM help
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Choose 3 points on the MM (Not DTM’s) wherever and then set the tolerance level but make sure it’s not too high or it will click other spots, you can check up the top somewhere if you’re going too high.

I have to go to school now so I will talk to you when I get back

You have to use if(FindDTM(
Like you said in your last post.

GL.

Read full topic

item.title: DTM help
item.dc:creator: @omgh4x0rz omgh4x0rz
item.description:
@omgh4x0rz wrote:

I’m trying to use DTMs to walk, but I can’t even get it to click the first waypoint. The DTM I set is in the minimap, but when I run the script, it just moves the mouse to the bottom right corner of the parameters I set for SCAR to search in. It works when I make a DTM for objects in my inventory, but for some reason it won’t work for places on the minimap. Thanks for any help.

program New;
var
x,y,point1:integer;

begin
point1 := DTMFromString(‘78DA637CCBC8C0B096010504E609826946289’ +
‘FF13E90B50C554D54D17F5435F381AC83A86A92CA97A2AAD90364’ +
‘1D4555F3F2D30B4CBB2EA1AA79029383D13F81AC6304D47C00B29’ +
‘6E0B70B0006161681’);
findDTM(point,x,y,654,170,893,333);
movemousesmooth(x,y);
end.

Read full topic
